duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive the recommendations, implementation, and management of all talent development technology systems and resources.
Manage projects for key talent development initiatives, including new tools and processes, as well as existing learning systems.
Interact and consult with leaders and employees from all parts of the business to ensure seamless and timely development and delivery of talent development tools and systems.
Manage learning technology processes and systems, including LMS, SharePoint, authoring and graphics tools, and performance/goals systems.
Manage vendor relationships associated with talent development technology, including Bridge, viaPeople, etc.
Partner with HR Systems, IT, and functional training teams on talent system RFPs and implementation.
Execute the employee engagement survey, including project management, partnership with the vendor, timelines and communication, and alignment of stakeholders.
Recommend and implement talent development reporting metrics and stay updated on the latest advancements and best practices in learning technology.
Create and manage training resources, including manuals, guides, videos, and online resources for ease of access.
Establish and maintain collaborative partnerships with business unit leaders and HR Business Partners to identify business needs and relevant solutions.
Lead and/or contribute to the continuous process improvement within talent development, specifically related to technology and development of instructional materials.
Serve as project manager for assigned projects, plan project tasks and time estimates, and consult with subject matter experts (SMEs) to draft learning objectives and content outlines.
Design and develop training, simulations, and assessment activities, including testing and quality assurance of deliverables.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or higher in a relevant field like Business Administration, Human Resources, Computer Science, Engineering, or Information Technology, or 5+ years professional work experience
